ygData.subject: RE: Lookin fer fletchie kit in Grobb
ygData.msgSnippet: The closest place to get fletchie kits, my green friend, is to travel to the Centaur Camp in  the southern plains of Karana.  Me tankee yu fer da
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
The closest place to get fletchie kits, my green friend, is to travel to the
Centaur Camp in the southern plains of Karana.
<snip>

Me tankee yu fer da help. It make me reel mad dat hummies n dem kind ken
get dere kits at home, but we trollies hafta go meny milez ta gets ours.

<snip>
Actually I believe there is an ogre in the feerot who sells fletching
kits...
<snip>

Tankee fer dis infermation. Dis ogur sells da bowshafts n stringies, but
not da kits. I talkee ta her last nite.

Ashuk
Tunare Server
